H0.text: Which country has the greatest number of ancient pyramids? (hint: They are called the Nubian Pyramids). Egypt

H1.text: Which country has the greatest number of ancient pyramids? (hint: They are called the Nubian Pyramids). Ethiopia

H2.text: Which country has the greatest number of ancient pyramids? (hint: They are called the Nubian Pyramids). Chad

H3.text: Which country has the greatest number of ancient pyramids? (hint: They are called the Nubian Pyramids). Sudan

A4.text: The Nubian pyramids were constructed by the rulers of the ancient Kushite kingdoms in the region of the Nile Valley known as Nubia, located in present-day northern Sudan.

A5.text: Approximately 255 pyramids are known to have been constructed by the Nubians, more than double the number constructed in Ancient Egypt.
